Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Holiday Inn Golden Mile, you'll be centrally located in Kowloon, steps from Nathan Road and iSQUARE. This 4-star hotel is close to Harbour City and Avenue of Stars.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 621 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Holiday Inn Golden Mile, you'll be centrally located in Kowloon, steps from Nathan Road and iSQUARE. This 4-star hotel is close to Harbour City and Avenue of Stars.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Nathan Road - 0 km / 0 mi
ISQUARE - 0 km / 0 mi
K11 Shopping Mall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Hong Kong Space Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Kowloon Mosque and Islamic Centre - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Hong Kong Cultural Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
1881 Heritage - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Harbour City - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Canton Road - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Hong Kong Museum of Art - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Avenue of Stars - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Tsim Sha Tsui Clock Tower - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Tsim Sha Tsui Star Ferry Pier - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Miramar Shopping Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Hong Kong Heritage Discovery Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Golden Mile is Hong Kong (HKG-Hong Kong Intl.) - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Late cancellation will be subject to 1 night charge. for low season (5 may-7 sept, 8-19 december 2013, and 17-31 january, 5-28 february 2014 ): -- receive a complimentary hk$ 500 net credit with a minimum stay of 3 consecutive nights per room per stay to be used in 5 restaurants for food/beverage consumption, room service, in-room internet, minibar, local calls, long distance calls and laundry. credit amount cannot redeem as cash. extra amount consumed will be settled by guest upon departure by cash or credit card. -- guaranteed free-of-charge late check out till 3 Holiday Inn Golden Mile provides free smartphone services for guests with unlimited data and free calls to Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, Thailand, Philippines, India, UK, France, Germany, Israel and Australia.
